title: Morty's Swim Surprise
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,041 words, Level Q (Grade 3), Lexile 760L, Fiction Series
description: When Morty's dad decides to save some money by canceling their membership to the country club pool, Morty takes matters into his own hands. Enlisting the help of his two younger brothers, Morty decides to surprise their parents by building a pool in the backyard. Needless to say, nothing goes according to plan, and Morty's parents are beyond dismayed with the results. The book can be used to teach students cause-and-effect relationships as well as how to effectively make, revise, and confirm predictions.
meta: antic, dismay, envisioned, exhaustion, mature, misshapen, oozing, reluctantly, secrecy
